Company: Stone Oak Urgent Care and Family Practice
Description of incident: A computer or laptop was discovered to have been lost or stolen on or around October 23, 2011. UPDATE (12/28/2011): A total of five computers containing medical and personal information were stolen from a physician's office during the breach.  A thief had pried open an office door during the weekend of October 22-23.  Patients were informed on December 5 that their names, Social Security numbers, dates of birth, account numbers, disability codes, and diagnoses were stored on the computers.
